text: trong chea anak del ban bangkeut phendei aoy mean pheap ngeayosruol samreab puok anak . dau che neah chaur puok anak thveudamnaer krobtisati now leu vea haey chaur puok anak briphok ampi leaphosakkar robsa trong choh . haey kar rsa laengvinh( daembi chomnoumchomreah) ku chhpaohtow rk trong temuoyokt
